Rob Middleton takes a look at how the women's half of York Sport have been quietly effective and impressive over the last term

Parity in prize money - a long journey ahead

A recent study on prize money in sport re-opened the gender debate within sport and how we can close the gap financially. Rob Middleton briefly looks at the sports that are doing it well, those that are doing it not so well and where the future may lie

Having been sentenced to five years in prison for the shooting of Reeva Steenkamp, Lewis Hill looks back on the career of Oscar Pistorius and the impact that the shooting will have on it
